storyInfo: Blake negotiates with the Vice President and makes a risky decision. Saria and the Tin Man analyze Control's objective. Silence is saved by the Director of the Human Resource Investigation Section, Jara. In a gloomy building, Nasti mutters a few words.

attributes.content: Colonel, sorry to keep you waiting for a half hour.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: I'm the one who should apologize, Mr. Vice President. Your schedule in Trimounts is packed, and I heard from Secretary Pavard you had to cancel a meeting on account of my sudden visit.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The military's response to the District 13 incident has been quick...
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: It has also been intense.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: You had just given such a powerful, rousing speech for the masses. This couldn't have happened at a worse time.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: By the looks of things, this is more than a little 'accident' on your end as well.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: I'm just saying... It's still too soon to reveal the 'Horizon Arc Project' to the public.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Which is why we would like you to cancel the rest of your itinerary and leave Trimounts. And we'll take care of these 'accidents' as soon as we can.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Colonel, I understand what you're asking...
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: But my schedule isn't going to change. In fact, I'm going to extend my stay in Trimounts.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: In my last meeting, I decided I'm going to Rhine Lab to enjoy a fruitful dialogue with our exceptional researchers.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: We're one Columbia, Colonel Blake. We're all ready to give everything for our country.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: But, with all the technological pioneers gathered in this city, they form the bedrock of Columbia's technological development. It's no exaggeration to say they're shaping the future of our country.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Do you understand what I'm getting at?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Even on the assembly lines of our nation's most developed munitions plants, it takes a day and a half to produce a single shell to spec.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: And that doesn't include the time it takes to send it out into the field to give the men some real practical time on the thing.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Take a step back, Colonel. The more we find ourselves facing superweapons that can change the world, like that 'Arc-01', the more composed we have to be.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: This is Columbia. Not Sargon, not Bol√≠var.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: These past few years, the Armed Forces, or more accurately, the Department of Defense, has continued to explore the nation's military capabilities.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: As a whole, progress has been fairly steady. From the President's perspective, this is a good thing, and he is glad to see it happen.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: However, given the shifts in international dynamics in recent years, particularly the re-emergence of Victoria's Shard, a number of things have changed.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Such a terrifying superweapon has erased the concept of 'distance.' All our ground defenses will be rendered useless, and the dust brought about by the Storm may well fall upon our pillows at any time.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: The voices within the Department of Defense have grown increasingly hawkish, and a number of troubling signs have already appeared. They're hedging their bets on the research and development of similar era-defining strategic weapons.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: And that's how Kristen caught the military's eye?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Correct. Kristen became the military's core technical advisor.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: In a very short period of time, she submitted the proposal for the 'Horizon Arc Project,' planned the construction of the Arc-01 superweapon, and quickly began its implementation.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: The military has devoted a vast amount of resources to it, and as such, Rhine Lab has enjoyed greater policy-side support for quite some time now.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: This is why Rhine has been able to stand head and shoulders above many other tech companies in Trimounts.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: According to the information we have on hand, the construction of Arc-01 required digging complex S.H.A.F.T.s as well as erecting a H.A.M.H.R.R. at our aircrafts' altitude limit.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: A monumental project indeed, and the military has spared no expense in the effort.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I imagine the man in front of you who fell from the sky was a part of this project.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Saria's eyes shift from the factory ruins to the sky above her.
Using the sky as an intermediary transfer node?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: We don't know the specific conceptual design, or how it's implemented...
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Using the sky as a transfer node to focus or redirect an enormous amount of energy, so as to achieve a powerful strike over extreme distance...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: In theory, that is indeed possible...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But would Kristen really help the military construct a superweapon?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Looks like you didn't get the answer you wanted.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I knew from the beginning. This just makes it more apparent.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: A good politician would never rush to make his stance clear. At least for now, they don't want us taking over the project that fast.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: And how do they intend to do that?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It's simple. All they need to do is delay. If we say that efficiency is the pursuit of scientific research, then, Ferdinand, 'delay' is the preferred tool of these politicians.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: When the Singas administration first entered negotiations in Congress to reclaim the Woods Company's logging camp, virtually no progress was made in three years. It took the latter party losing control of the area.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: They want to delay until we have our hands full, until we lose faith in that damned 'Horizon Arc Project,' until it doesn't matter anymore.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: You've already been on-site, right? What are your conclusions?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: It was indeed the test flight of Arc-01's H.A.M.H.R.R.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The sky appears clear, but it is far from being a safe haven. Kristen will need to test the new pressure and navigation system, a trial-and-error process that may need more than one flight.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I'm more curious about the military-controlled S.H.A.F.T. at the bottom of Arc-01. Where did Kristen launch a beast of that size?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The H.A.M.H.R.R.'s black box still hasn't been found? By tracing its routing data, we can triangulate the position of the launch site and locate Kristen.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: We already conducted a full-scale search in District 13. Came up empty.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Someone managed to retrieve the black box at the very beginning.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Any possibility it might've been destroyed, given an explosion of that scope...?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Kristen has already been missing for two weeks. She may have already obtained the experimental data she wanted in the black box, but she still doesn't want us to find her.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: In other words, the so-called 'Horizon Arc Project,' propped up by the military itself, is completely out of the military's hands.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The longer the delay, the more variables there will be.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: That's right. Jackson had no intention of talking things through with us.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Me? Why would I have anything to hide? Go ask the agent sent to spy on Kristen...
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Understood. I won't give an inch. I'll resolve this situation post-haste.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Wait, what did you say?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: That's...
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Alright, I understand.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: You don't look so good, Colonel.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You're right, Ferdinand. We can't let ourselves get bogged down any longer.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The fact that Kristen went AWOL while the military had eyes on her precisely shows that the project has progressed to a near-feasible state.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: She might've defrauded her investors.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: We have our suspicious as well, but you seem pretty sure of it, Saria.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Because I know her well enough.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Since its establishment, Rhine Lab has been committed to breakthrough research in civilian technology, and rarely intersects with the military. Kristen herself has no interest in it.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Furthermore...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: If the 'sky' were part of her research plans, it would not be a means, but rather her ultimate objective.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The Wrights?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Precisely.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: 'We haven't even explored everything these lands have to offer, and have only just begun measuring the heights of the skies. Why fly to such high places in vain?'
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I still remember that comment in the newspaper made by the hovercraft expert, Stevenson, after the Wrights' test flight crashed.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: It encapsulated his regret for the death of the genius scientists, but has been twisted out of context as 'accurate peer review.' How ironic that it's become a weapon used against the Wrights.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'd like to hear more.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Stevenson had a very good relationship with the Wrights, and even looked after Kristen to some degree after their passing. Later, Kristen was able to get on track in academia thanks to his recommendation.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: A substantial secret that even I'm not aware of.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: But, the relationship between Stevenson and Kristen is not a cozy one. She inherited her parents' obsession with the skies, and does not expect others to understand.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: She abhors the sky, Tin Man.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: It can't be a coincidence that Transmitter appeared at the scene of the accident, but what exactly is the connection between Transmitter and the explosion?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Did the things used in this factory require Transmitters? I recall no such relationships between Triton Chemicals and Rhine Lab. Or, perhaps, the Transmitter had something to do with the ring-shaped mechanical object that smashed through the factory building...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Saria's too far away. I can't hear what she's saying...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Maybe I can try moving the drone a bit closer.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: An unidentified drone has been shot down.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Oh no...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Miss, show me your security clearance.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Don't have one? District 13 is under temporary lockdown. I'm gonna have to ask you to come with me.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: I'm a worker at the Triton factory. I had the day off today, but I heard the factory exploded... so I came here to see what's going on.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If you're a worker at the factory, then explain the drone. And don't say you have nothing to do with it.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: I‚Äî
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She's going to photograph the site.
Marianne...?!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Is it really you? Oh my g‚Äî
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Marianne...
attributes.name: Marianne

attributes.content: The last time I heard that name... was forty years.
attributes.name: Marianne

attributes.content: You're talking about that press conference, right? It was right around the time your last movie came out, you told the world you got hurt in a Catastrophe while shooting the thing, and you retired to behind-the-scenes work...
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: My dad goes nuts every time he talks about you!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: He's got your complete filmography collection, and we've watched every movie ten times over!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: I still remember 'The Spy Catchers'! You caught saw the spy on the shore and leapt straight off that cruise ship! That was something...
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: You just melt into every role you play. Today's mass-produced Wrankwood stars could take a cue or two from you.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Marianne

attributes.content: Unfortunately, the only role Marianne plays these days is a negotiator of employee salaries.
attributes.name: Marianne

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Director of Human Resources at Rhine Lab, Jara Booker Wilson. This is my clearance. I have a house in District 13.
attributes.name: Marianne

attributes.content: This woman is indeed a Triton employee. Rhine Lab and Triton Chemicals had a number of... disagreements. Just like the corporate struggles in 'The Spy Catcher'...
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I know. This is Trimounts, after all.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: A subsidiary factory suddenly went up in flames. If photos from the scene hit the tabloids, that would send Triton down in scandal. This is her housewarming gift for joining Rhine.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: That would indeed be a violation of military regulations. Fortunately, the drone's been shot down, so the photos won't leak.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Now then, let's move on and discuss your job-hopping.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: ...Sure.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But let me add something first. Isn't it a little unreasonable to suddenly ask the locals to lock themselves inside and wait for updates before they can do anything?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: We're just following orders.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Miss Marianne, I... I want to trust you. So, both of you, please leave. No exceptions.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Your name's Silence, right? I remember you were helping Parvis bring me some black bean tea.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Director Jara, does this have something to do with Rhine Lab?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's why you snuck in here?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: There are... some things I need to make sure of.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This isn't exactly the best place for chit-chat.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Head over here, and wait for me.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Where are we...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't worry. It's my District 13 residence.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I have company. An old friend has some business with me.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I don't think I've ever heard you breathing. When you smoke, are you just letting it swirl around your stomach?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: It's a habit. Just like what you used to do after finishing a mission. You'd record the event on a note before burning it on the spot.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: That young researcher back there... You always have a soft spot for the youth.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Eh, can't exactly ignore it, can I?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: An employee of my own company shows up in a military lockdown, it's be bad for business if she gets caught.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I see you're just as attentive to detail as ever, regardless of what field you're in.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: You've caught my eye a number of times over the years. From the intermediary investor for all of Trimounts to the head of Rhine HR, you've contributed pretty much your entire network to this tech company.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: In other words, without you, we wouldn't have the Kristen we know today.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: So, is you being here right now also the fault of that reckless girl?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Or, do you have ideas of your own?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Have you considered the possibility that I'm here because I bought a residence in District 13, and that I spend a few days here when I'm not too busy?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I'm getting old, Tin Man.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Age notwithstanding, when I came back to my senses, I realized that my health, my dreams, my friends, and my family... had all been given to my country.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: In the end, nothing remained of Maylander's 'Morningstar.'
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I don't even have any tapes of the movies I made when I was young by which to remember my so-called 'youth.'
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I wasn't trying to point the finger at you, Jara.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: But if you're hoping that I turn a blind eye to this, I'm afraid I can't help you... Maylander's only responsibility is to the country.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I just wanted to tell you I have no regrets. So even now, I won't do anything that would truly harm Columbia.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Are you still mourning the death of the Wrights?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: As much as I'd like to deny it, the scene still haunts my dreams even now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Delivery. Come sign for it.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Put it on the workstation.
Ho'olheyak scans the space in front of her, a massive, hollow underground ring-shaped structure. In other words, a 'well.'

Originium lamps fastened to the well's walls provided only a basic lighting, making it difficult to determine the overall depth. Inlaid within the grooves running along the walls are cables extending into the darkness.
The person with who she was speaking earlier is now pacing back and forth, leaving her with but a busy silhouette.

She seems to be busy testing something. Even in such a deep area, her actions do not seem to cause much of an echo. Presumably, the surface structure incorporates some high-performance sound-absorbing material.
The entire area seems to be as still and silent as lingering mist.
Are you not afraid of the dark? Do you not get bored? We're several hundred meters underground... and those boorish soldiers are patrolling just above us.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You've been here a number of months, right? Haven't gone up for a walk?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Nasti?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I'm busy, K'uk'ulkan.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I don't have much free time on my hands, either.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: What I'm saying is, put the black box down, and get lost.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I'm taking a risk here to get this to you under the watchful eyes of the military and Maylander. That's a bit cold of you, wouldn't you agree?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: This is a deal between you and Control. It's got nothing to do with me.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: You didn't do anything with the black box after you got your hands on it, did you?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Damn, ice cold.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: The data calculations are... Well, not that complicated.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Nasti dives back into her own work, and the screen is once again engulfed with a large amount of data, like a tide flooding across land.
She focuses up more, leaving Ho'olheyak alone to do little else than stare at her back. That is when she notices the devices around her waist‚Äì
They appear as a lattice of dead branches, spliced together irregularly. But as Nasti intermittently works at her station, they sway back and forth in a short, regular rhythm.
As if sentient, they seem to be following Nasti's thoughts.
Looks like you managed to find nourishment for the rootless branches... Hmph.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The trajectory data has deviated slightly from the previous calculation, but is still within the expected range. It appears that Transmitter can indeed be used as an alternative navigation resource.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: That being the case, we need to speed things up.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: By the way, how did Kristen get you, the head of Engineering, to willingly coop yourself up underground to do the hard work for her?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Nasti doesn't answer. She enters a few commands, and as the screens in front of her go dark one by one, she turns and heads towards the door. Behind her, the underground space becomes dimmer and dimmer.
Ready to touch some grass, Nasti? Did something good happen? Surely you're not going to keep the good news from me?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: (In Sarkaz) Begone.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Ho'olheyak takes a step back upon hearing that one word. Her body instinctively carries out the order, as if executing a 'command.'
Cute curse you have there, Banshee.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Did any of the staff ever tell you you've got a bad temper?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The icy-cold air caresses Nasti's neck before dissipating like an illusion. The young banshee shivers slightly.
A crack forms across the bone pen in her hand.
Oh my, they don't quite make them like they used to, do they? I know you have an entire drawer filled with spares.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: But, I've always been curious... if you broke all of your bone pens, would you still be able to perform your little tricks?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Go ahead and try me.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I won't give the same command twice, K'uk'ulkan.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Fine, fine. Are all Banshees as much of a stick in the mud as you?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Don't pass up on this rare opportunity to get some fresh air. If you're afraid of the dark, I don't mind keeping you company partway.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Before the banshee can speak again, Ho'olheyak nimbly disappears behind the door.
The darkness lingering within the air trembles violently for a spell, then Nasti finally lets go of her words.
...Ugh.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I should go pick her up.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: (In Sarkaz) At last, the muddled dream is about to settle.
attributes.name: Nasti
